hook.text: In the 1990s, AI stopped trying to think like humans and started crunching numbers instead.

buildup.text: Researchers replaced symbolic logic with probability, statistics, and optimization.

discovery.text: Spam filters, speech recognition, and search engines all ran on statistical models.
